transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Kapil ji very good afternoon.
Customer: Haan very good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ji Raju Mishra this side from IndiaMART head office in the we had discussed in the morning sir regarding the buyleads yes yes I know sir.
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: So I just checked on your portal yeah so basically I just check the buyleads and
Customer: Buyleads okay.
Executive: So now if you see on the portal you are getting the buyleads and I had discussed with digital door lock Amritsar Punjab six minute ago just check your buyleads sir.
Customer: Let me check.
Customer: So I am not asking about today data I am asking about last few days.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: See what exactly happened here we are since now we are consuming also the bulk buyleads as well as the retail buyleads and I had registered concern that you will get if you are seeing the buyleads in a one piece of one quantity okay so in that case the the probable order where as you told me that showing as a business use okay while the customer is searching for the personal use right?
Customer: Right.
Customer: Right.
Executive: So so see in this case we can we can connect we can connect call with Kriti mam also.
Customer: Yes definitely consideration about.
Executive: Sure sure.
Executive: Wait a minute okay now I am in conference with.
(silence)
Executive: Right now face with ji so you can discuss with me or you can schedule a meeting when you are whenever you are free.
Customer: I am free right now for you sir whenever you have just need to be convenient time okay I just right now dekh raha hu na to digital door lock ek buylead Punjab se aayi hai isko please consume karne layak comfortable kar liya maine usko dekh ke kar liya maine.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dekh lijiye second ek aur hai biometric smart door lock karke Amritsar Punjab se 33 piece ke liye.
Customer: Haan wo bhi kar liya hai 36 piece ka.
Executive: Abhi 36 piece ka kya then second abhi maine kiya nahi main check kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan ji dekh ke dijiye and dekhiye main aap Kapil sir do cheeze batana chahunga ki buyleads ka jo flow bata rahe hain na ki actually aaj aapke pass bulk buyleads aa rahi hai aur last two weeks se hum buyleads us tarike se nahi le pa rahe hain jis jaise hume ummid hai theek hai so definitely main ye kabhi bhi nahi kahunga sir ki nahi leads pe hamara koi us tarike se control hota hai kyunki jo lead generate hoti hai hum bas ye karte hain bhai ye check kar sakta hu ki sir kahin hamare pass jo lead aa rahi hai ki hamare catalog mein to problem nahi hai kyunki meri jo authority hai wo catalog ko sahi karke aapke pass relevant and one ke liye jo flow hai wo main de sakta hu theek hai but hai kya ki aapka jo buyer hai na hum na sir Raju sir ke sath mein I think aapki team se hi hai main Raju sir se hi baat kar raha hu hum last acha acha theek hai to last time hum ye to catalog aapna correct kar chuke the jo hamari jo mismatch tha jo hamari incorrect thi details usko hum correctly fill kar chuke hain.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul wahi humne kiya bhi hai aur aapko fir bhi lag raha hai kuch waha pe kuch issue hai us side se to hum usko bhi correct kar lenge nahi catalog mein catalog mein koi issue nahi sir in fact maine bhi check kiya har ek cheez theek hai aur isme main ye nahi kahunga aapse ki nahi catalog mein kuch issue hai agar issue hota to main in fact main turant karta theek hai aur mujhe jaha tak laga ki buyleads consume karne mein time lag raha hai delay ho rahi hai kuch issue hai ya kuch buyleads ka maine buyleads ka buyleads ka maine thoda sa ye notice high kiya hai sir ki hum jo buyleads consume kar rahe hain kyunki aapko pata hai ki hum buyleads show karate hain to waha se zero to four hours ki buyleads dikhate hain haan ye buyleads haan so waha pe hota kya hai na ki aap kyunki last time jab meri baat hui thi to Kriti mam ne mujhse ye kaha tha ki dekhiye kya hota hai ki kai sare buyers jo hote hain wo raat ko apni buyleads post karte hain theek hai and hum jab raat ko to kyunki possible nahi hai ki hum buyleads consume kar paye so hum jab din mein aate hain to usko consume karte hain to kyunki abhi main jo dekh raha tha buyleads consumption pattern to hum jo main jo 58% hamara jo ratio hai wo hai zero to four hours ki buyleads pe hum focus kar rahe hain and approximately 31% jo hai wo hum jo focus kar rahe hain wo four to 24 hours ke beech ki jo buyleads generate ho rahi hai us pe theek hai to mera suggestion aapko ek cheez aur rahega ki thoda sa hum isko kam kare zero to sorry four to 24 hours wali buyleads ko consume karna hum focus kare zero to four hours wali buyleads zyada consume kare exactly kyunki usme possibility zyada hoti hai match hone ka bilkul bilkul bilkul ye cheeze hain aur ye ye proper maine last time bhi jab discussion hua tha Kriti mam se to Kriti mam ne kyunki mujhe iska revertal diya ki nahi hum is tarike se consume karte hain isliye aapko waha pe show ho raha hai I agree with them sir but problem kya hai ki hume aapko bhi pata hai ki consumption pattern kyunki aapki ek buyleads ko hum sabhi supplier ko show karate hain but consume keval panch log hi karte hain theek hai consume keval panch log hi karte hain ab for example hum hyper active hain aur agar aap ek kam kare agar aap buyleads wale option pe jayenge to waha pe aapko na right side mein bottom ki taraf aapko ek option show ho raha hoga past leads ka hmm show ho raha hai aapko kis lead ka show hota hai past lead ka ek option aa raha hoga aapke buyleads wale option mein haan past niche ki taraf dekhiye right side past past transaction dikh raha hai mujhe nahi nahi uske niche dekhiye theek usi ke usi column ke niche aap dekhenge jaha pe right side mein buyer profile balance hai likha hota hai na uske upar theek likha hua hai right side mein bottom mein bottom mein right side mein aana hai mujhe buyer ji buyleads mein aana hai aapko okay upar side top side ya bottom side top ke right mein ya left mein right mein bottom mein top mein nahi bottom mein bottom mein niche ki taraf corner mein dekhiye right side ko balance haan past buyer profile and past haan us pe click kariye is pe jab aap click karenge na to aapko yaha pe dikh jayega ki kyunki hum buyleads generate kar rahe hain theek hai theek hai so haan theek hai na to ye leads ab yaha pe I am interested kar dijiye to kya hai matlab aapka kehne ka matlab ye hai ki aap thoda aur activeness isme rahe actively inko buyleads ko purchase karne ke liye within jo jo recently lead jo hai aapki side se waha pe update ho rahi hai haan uske liye aap ye kehna chah rahe ho bilkul bilkul ab dekhiye do cheeze ho sakti hain sir ek ho sakta hai hamare pass do option hai aur aap keh rahe ho ki matlab jo ek lead aap post karte ho wo panch buyer se usko bas buy kar sakte hain is pe limit hai aap keh rahe ho haan keval panch hi supplier consume kar sakte hain theek hai na theek hai panch hi consume kar sakte hain haan ye hotel lock wali jo category jo sold out dikh rahi hai is particular buylead ko panch supplier ne consume kar liya tabhi ja kar ke sold out hua hai okay ab isme main aapko bhi galat nahi bol sakta yaha pe main IndiaMART ko bhi galat nahi bol sakta aap exactly samajh sakte hain kyunki yaha pe meri bhi galti nahi hai aur aapki bhi galti nahi hai theek hai isme problem is that haan hume thoda sa wo karna padega aur hyper activity ek bar hota hoga ki dekhiye sir kya hai na ki hamare pass ek sales team baithi hai matlab aap logo ki baat karta hu theek hai agar aap practically bhi notice karenge na to us time pe hota kya hai ki agar har ek sales person apni call pe kyunki aapke liye bhi abhi target hota hoga ki hume aaj itne buyer ko approach karna hai right ab us time se agar Kriti mam bhi keval handle kar rahi IndiaMART ke portal ko to ho sakta hai ki Kriti mam ke pass aur bhi work ho to mujhe agar ye kaha ja raha hai ki main hyper active hu leads mujhe show nahi ho rahi hai to aisa ho hi nahi sakta kyunki agar ye one hour ago ki agar buylead hai aur humne consume nahi kiya so main to ye bhi bol sakta na ki sir main aapko bulk buylead nahi de pa raha hu ya fir hamare waha bulk buylead generate nahi ho rahi hai practically sochiye sir theek hai so mera main motive yahi hai ki main mere pass buyleads ya fir quality agar aapka catalog sahi nahi hota na to aapke pass itni buyleads sold out show hi nahi hoti matlab past buyleads mein is prakar ki lead show hi nahi hoti aapko hope you understand ki main kya kehna chahta hu to abhi aap ye feed dena chah rahe ho ki humko thoda actively lead ke liye rehna hai aur aap ye kehna chahte ho aur haan matlab aur aur thoda sa haan hyper active rehna matlab main ye zarur maine mam ko ek bar bola tha ki mam ek aap wo use kar lijiye refresher use kar lijiye kyunki kai bar aapne notice kiya hoga ki aapko manually refresh karna padta hai to manually refresh karne ki jagah pe agar wo automatically har 10 second mein refresh hoga na to jo hamare pass sold out ka thoda bahut issue chal raha hai kafi had tak kam ho jayega main ye nahi kehta ki pura kam ho jayega but kafi had tak kam ho jayega iske liye na hum ek bar meeting kar lenge Kriti mam ko line pe leke thoda time dijiye main ek bar dekh deta hu schedule jo bhi aapki taraf se jo aap bata rahe ho conclusion jo bhi hai theek hai uske upar meeting kar lenge haan Kapil sir ek baat aur mam blame kahin pe nahi kar raha hu matlab main aapko ye nahi keh raha hu ki sir main aapko kuch aisa bol raha hu ki nahi aapne nahi kiya nahi sir yaha pe na aapki galti hai na hi IndiaMART ki galti hai kyunki hum aapko ye bhi dikha sakte hain agar past leads mein aapko ye dikha pa raha hu ki sold out ho rahi hai iska matlab lead generate ho raha hai portal se theek hai ab do cheeze ho sakti hain ya to hum consume nahi kar pa rahe hain ya fir us samay kahin aur busy ho pa rahe hain theek hai yaha pe main kahin kisi ko complain ya fir aapke pass upar main ye nahi keh raha sir ki aapki galti hai nahi kabhi nahi sir kyunki aap apne taraf se kafi better performance de rahe hain hope you understand main kya kehna chahta hu yaha pe kya ho raha hai ki buyleads ka consumption kyunki highly competitive product hai aapka aur aapko better tarike se pata hai ki Aligarh mein bahut sare supplier maujud hai jo ki isme deal karte hain exactly to market kyunki competitive hai to iska matlab ye nahi ki hum leads aapko ek usme aa kar ke nahi dena chahte nahi hum dena chahte hain in fact de bhi rahe hain sold out mein yahi hai ki thoda sold out isliye ho raha hai panch supplier consume kar sakte hain that's it sir catalog ki baat karu catalog pe hamara abhi product kafi acha hai abhi maine ek product add kiya hai hotel lock karke hotel lock ek aur lekin kyunki hotel lock category of product mein difference hai theek hai na to maine usko add kiya taki aapke pass aur lead generate ho sake to wo buylead ka flow chalega matlab aapke pass bulk wali bhi aayegi aur one quantity wali bhi aayegi but mera focus ye koi issue nahi hai to main samajh gaya aapka dekho aisa hai mujhe bulk quantity aur single piece se koi issue nahi hai but at least ek to ho ki matlab ratio itna to ho ki business bhi nikle us lead se samajh rahe ho matlab usme auto hai Kapil Kapil ji ek baat aur main aap se janna chahunga to man ke chaliye ki agar main aap se ye puchu ki agar humne 100 buyleads consume kari kyunki main jab aapka pattern dekhta hu na aap logo ka mujhe satisfy nahi hota hai ki haan buyleads aap jaisa main chahta hu ya fir jaisa ek ummid karta hai account manager apne supplier se ki haan us prakar ki buyleads consume kare us tarike se activity kare apni theek hai aap har jagah plus hain kahin negative mein nahi kahunga theek hai bas ye hai ki agar main puchu ki aap 100 buyleads agar consume karte hain pure month mein aap apna feedback dijiyega ki 100 mein se kitne percent buyer se aap follow up lete hain closing ki baat nahi kar raha hu follow up ki baat kar raha hu sir sir follow up to hamare 100 pe hi follow ups rehte hain bas wo baat alag hai kisi ko other brand mein jana hai ya fir kisi ko requirement nahi hai just check kar rahe the theek hai to usme follow up lapse ho jate hain matlab wo close ho jate hain then otherwise follow ups hamari meri puri team rehti hai theek hai to hum mujhe bhi all are actively rehte hain follow ups pe to okay ek ek cheez aur aap se mujhe confirmation leni thi kyunki aapko pata hai sir ki hamare pass teen sources hain theek hai pehla hai buyleads dusra hai customer directly aapko call karta hai third hai aapka direct inquiry theek hai direct inquiry wo aap lead manager mein access kar pate hain jaha pe aapko ye dikhta hai ki nahi mujhe kahan pe kis prakar ki leads ya inquiry chahiye theek hai agar Kriti mam ho to ek bar unse agar aap abhi possible karwa sakte hain kya kyunki main dekh raha hu ki aapke pass inquiry kal generate hui thi aaj abhi generate hui hai to wo bhi hotel safe locker ki kal jo generate hui thi kal maine lead address kiya tha kal jo mostly leads thi na usme se laga lo 80% logo ne call pick hi nahi kiya tha khair wo alag concern hai call pick nahi kiya tha theek hai haan uske alava teen leads on call pe connect ho gaye the unko requirement nahi tha wo just check kar rahe the kal maine 23 leads consume ki thi 22 23 Kriti mam hai kya Kriti mam hai abhi puch dekh raha hu free hai to agar wo jo hai ye bhi zaruri hai kyunki humne concern dekhte hain kyunki dekhiye sir main unse maine kai bar bola hai ki aap bhi kabhi bhi concern raise karte hain mere pass hi aata hai and in fact main jab se last time baat hui thi humne isi work karna hai theek hai main dekhna chahunga team members free hai to main ek bar check kar leta hu aap please check kar lijiye to main video schedule karunga na main dikhana chahunga mam ka concern do teen cheeze hota hai acha meeting ke liye main aapko na confirm karta hu thoda time dijiye mujhe na meeting ka to main confirm karta hu ek wo jo aap remotely aap share kar dena then hum check kar lete hain dekh lenge abhi to hum abhi ke liye disconnect kar dete hain then main aapko update aapka yahi number rahega call ke liye nahi Kriti mam ke pass mera number hai acha acha theek hai main bol dunga ki ek bar schedule karke aapko update kar lenge us call mein abhi ho jaunga join main aapko Kriti mam ko denge main aapko kitne der mein haan main aapko kitne der mein call back kar sakta hu agar aap mujhe allow kare to around 4 pm ke liye done hai sir haan theek hai okay okay okay sir thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants more relevant buyleads.

- Wants to know about buyleads consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about buyleads consumption pattern.

- Executive suggested to focus on 0-4 hour buyleads.

- Executive will schedule a meeting with Kriti.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back around 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, consumption, follow up
